arts.ttl: Ecuador/New Zealand video highlights (2-0), Tri secures victory with Pacho
arts.sum: Below is a video summary of the Ecuador vs. New Zealand match, featuring goals from Nilson Angulo and Leonardo Campana. Ecuador played a friendly match at the Sports Illustrated Stadium on Wednesday against New Zealand. One Paris Saint-Germain player was in the Ecuadorian squad: Willian Pacho (24-year-old defender). He started in the 2-0 victory. Ecuador […]
